website_summaries.verdict: Loved for generations, this push-car favorite is great for customers who want a safer, reliable toy for their child at a good price.
pros: Removable floor for when children want to push themselves
Back of car includes a handle for easy parental steering
Comes with a steering wheel for child's control
Front wheels spin 360 degrees for simple maneuvering
cons: Steering wheel can snap off with excessive use

customer_reviews.title: Assembly requires three miracles, two phenomena, an act of God and the blood of Jesus. Good luck.
customer_reviews.text: Take my advice, as a grandpa who has assembled lots of hist in my life, read all the instructions before you start. Watch their YouTube video how-to assemble. This car is cute but you will need an engineering degree from MIT along with a team of tool experts to put this together. My curse vocab expanded during the construction phase. I was cursing China until I saw Made in America on the box. Do yourself a favor, watch the video before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: WillsReviewz

customer_reviews.title: Steering Wheel Snapped Off After 16 Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago Christmas for my granddaughter. I was expecting it to be somewhere near the quality of the Cozy Coupe that was popular when her mother was a preschooler in the 80's. We were very disappointed when the steering wheel snapped off when my granddaughter was turning it. Fortunately, she wasn't injured as she was going at some speed. Unfortunately, there's no way to reattach the steering wheel. I expected a quality item and for it to last many years. As it is, it lasted 16 months. Now my daughter has a large useless hunk of plastic decorating her yard.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I received my cozy coupe back in the late 80s for christmas and it was my favorite present. Now my niece is 1 and what ...
customer_reviews.text: This little item has now become a family tradition. I received my cozy coupe back in the late 80s for christmas and it was my favorite present. Now my niece is 1 and what perfect present than this little number. Installation was not as bad as some people made it sound, i actually thought it was quite ingenious is some ways, just the engineering in general, overall took me 20min or so. All worth it when I wheeled it in and when my niece saw it. It was the only present she got that she knew was for her and its been hard enough to keep her out of it! Little Tikes, keep up the fine work. American made.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Warning putting the car together was hell but seeing how much he loved it was well worth the work
customer_reviews.text: My nephew adored this car! Warning putting the car together was hell but seeing how much he loved it was well worth the work. Even with all the helpful videos they have putting this car together I still put the wrong bolts on the tires that were suppose to go on the top of the poll for the front wheels. I had to find the bolt cap at a local hardware shop otherwise going online it was like $15! Yikes. Anyways it took forever to put together and luckily I got it weeks before my nephews birthday. Be prepared for a horrible experience putting it together but your kiddos will really enjoy the product of your pain.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my daughter’s Christmas gifts. The little car is cute but it’s a nightmare to put it together. The manufacturer doesn’t make it easy on you at all. Even parts like the eyes of the car that could totally be already on it, we have to do it. It’s a complete DIY and I was not expecting that. I don’t remember how long exactly it took my husband and I to put it together (he is a very handy guy) but it was long enough to get us both annoyed. After all it’s a cute gift but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martina D

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than original. Tips over
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy car for my 2 year old grandchild. It looked the same as the one I had for my children when they were young however it is Half the width and tips over every time my grandchild tries to get in or out!!. So I can’t let her play in it without standing beside her. It is also impossible to maneuver it also collects water inside the base if left outside in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amz customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many ages
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters first birthday and she loved it. The new floor board makes it perfect for younger kids who can’t do the foot pedaling yet. It also has a handle for parents to walk kids around when they can’t foot pedal on their own. The floor board is removable making this car versatile for many age groups. Little Tikes also has You Tube videos for each step that walks you through assembly making it VERY EASY to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Defective item, do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old. It was a pain in the butt to put together as some of the holes for the roof did not align correctly. Additionally, the front wheels are TERRIBLE. The car can barely drive forward more than a couple of inches because the front wheels start spinning all over the place, it can only go backwards. Would not recommend, do not purchase, this is a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: the buudha

customer_reviews.title: Lots of parts to assemble but grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for Christmas. I knew assembly would be involved, but I never dreamed there would be so many pieces to put together. I was a little worried when I started the assembly but to my surprise I was actually able to get the job done! It was well worth putting it all together though cause my grandson absolutely loves his Cozy Coupe car. Watch the video that they tell you to watch on the directions. I felt that helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It's a Classic!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about the Cozy Coupe? I love the floorboard addition - it makes it fun for a one-year-old who doesn't walk yet. My kids had 'the red car' and now my grandchild does too! It's a perfect gift for the right aged child. I see people have issues with the assembly - there are great directions and with a rubber hammer and a little 'shoving' some pieces in, it takes under 30 minutes. All larger toys are like this; it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KristieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great toy (after some plastic surgery..)
customer_reviews.text: One of the holes for the front axle post was misshapen (problem with the mold I assume) so I had to play Dr. with my soldering iron for a while to reshape the plastic. Glad I had that in my toolbox otherwise I would have been sending it back for a replacement. Also put the sliding lock on the door. Also still might advise getting a helmet for younger toddlers (especially smart ones that can undo the lock and push open the door) and have them wear it just as an added safety measure. Other than that my 17 month old loves to be pushed around in it and honk the little horn.
customer_reviews.author: K.Rene

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toys we have ever bought for my 1
customer_reviews.text: We have had this car for 4 months now. One of the best toys we have ever bought for my 1.5 year old. It is not electrical so not noisy. We have play dates at our place often and all kids always want to play with this one. They specifically like that they can get in and close the door. Sometimes one sits in it while the others pushing it around. Keeps the kids busy for a long time, with no noise and no flashing light and ... Over all very happy with the purchase. It was a little harder to assemble comparing to the toys for kids around the same age though.
customer_reviews.author: shaziz

customer_reviews.title: cute and popular with the kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my twin grandsons, as I bought 1 for Christmas, and they fought over who got to sit in them. At age two, the boys mostly like to open the door and get in and then get out. The second car I purchased didn't have an indent for the door to seat into and my husband had to make a hole in the car to allow the door to stay in. This made the door a little difficult to open and close, but is working looser as time goes on. You'll definitely need and mallet to pound the hubs in place and a lot of patience to get the parts to fit together.
customer_reviews.author: E. Denny

customer_reviews.title: My Cute First Muscle Car
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I had my neighbor put this together for me. I have little patience these days. He said it really wasn't that bad. There were quite a few parts but if you followed the instructions (which men hate to do) it went together nicely. Right now I am pushing my 1 yr old granddaughter around in it but she does seem to like it a lot. She readily opens door and climbs in. I suspect in another month, we can take the floor board out and she will be getting around on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie K

customer_reviews.title: THE ASSEMBLY ALONE WILL HAVE YOU READY TO SEND IT BACK!
customer_reviews.text: Whew!!! Where do I begin purchased on 4/8/2020 received 4/29/2020, now the assembly is beyond me. I watched the video beforehand and realized the video and the car I purchased was different. The rear tire rod was too short so some parts were left off to fit the tire onto the rod. The nails for the eyes were wayyyy too short and there only 3 you need 4. Thank GOD my SO has spare nails or the car would be blind. Hire an assembler and save yourself the trouble this was a TOTAL MESS!!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so it took my husband and I (the grandparents) two hours to assemble but to be fair, it probably would have taken only an hour if we hadn’t been doing it together! We gave this car to her on her first birthday and she spent much of the party being pushed around by various relatives and friends! She was giggling and waving, not yet able to push the horn so everyone she went by helped her out! It was so much fun for her and all of us!
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product works and looks as described. Follow the instruction in order. I had to build the car after my wife put it together with out following the instructions. They are pretty straight forward. Do them in order and you will have no problems at all. You will need some small hand tools to completely build the car. The car also has a removal floorboard for small children who could slip through the flimsy one style bottom. Recommend that you use this for small children. The car also has a hand on the roof for and adult to be able to push the car or hold onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Bam Bam

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces, fun project..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually assemble stuff and i put this together by myself. The instructions are simple and well explained. It took me a long time, like 1 hour or an hour and a half because the amount of pieces is overwhelming but it was pretty fun actually. I enjoyed doing it. My son is 2 years old and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: NinaYH

customer_reviews.title: Like driving a car, but better! Free gas!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my grandson. I have somewhat vague recollections of owning one that my children had, but I remember it being bigger! Is that possible? Like I thought I remembered two of my children fitting in there, but there is NO way that two children could fit in there now! Anyway, my grandson loves it (and when it is their turn, my granddaughters get a ride too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My itte one loves it
customer_reviews.text: The Little Tikes Cozy Coupe 30th Anniversary Car was a great buy. My little one loves it. I like the small added features like the floorboard I could have added if she was little enough to push and the hand in the top and especially the cup holders. My toddler loves it, it s eay for her to get in and out of and go where ever she wants herself. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mahley

customer_reviews.title: My two-year-old couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: My son adores his car! He can easily ride it throughout the house and managed to get around inside as well as have a blast in the car outside. He spends much more time in it than I originally imagined and I am so happy that I purchased this. I have read reviews about the wheels and different complaints and I have absolutely no complaints I think everything is great on it and I am so happy that we decided to get this for our son
customer_reviews.author: Jen MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a pain to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old nephew's birthday. It is similar to the one I had growing up (a few updates) and I figured a staple for any kid. Putting it together was 100% a two person job. And I will give a word of caution, the front wheels came in their own little pouch and i threw those together first thing (thinking it would be easy) but there is a specific way you have to attach them. I would wait until you follow all the instructions for the main piece to do them.
customer_reviews.author: montie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Well we got this pretty quick, setting it up was ok but I really think they could have done 2 of the wheels. If you get this you need 2 people at least. Seems pretty good once you get past the front wheels that’s what takes the longest. But overall this is a pretty good item rolls smooth my baby loves it she’s 1 year and 4 months and was cruising in this!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super Car
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old grandson loves this. Rides in it every morning when he comes to my house. He still does not ride it by himself but I push him round the block with his cookies and water and he loves every minute of it. He sits whichever way he feels like and watches the world go by. I have used this so much and it is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chanie

customer_reviews.title: Nephew LOVES it, as do all toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I used to do child care and the number one toy of ALL kids are these Cozy Coupes. They LOVE getting INTO something and being like mom and dad, even putting the gas in. I've had huge castles, netted trampolines (another favorite) but for the money and all things considered, this is the greatest gift for toddlers. My sister thought she had the best because she knew my nephew loves any kind of ball game, basketball, etc., but nope, my Coupe Car is by far the fav! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Shroder

customer_reviews.title: Missing CRITICAL pieces for assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute nightmare to assemble and WAS MISSING CRITICAL PIECES! Absolutely ridiculous. So I guess now I have to order replacement parts because the thought of returning this mostly assembled pieces makes me cry. Updating my review to 3 stars because I called Little Tikes and they were great. They are sending replacement parts at no cost. However, it would be better if the parts needed were with the original box so I could complete the set up.
customer_reviews.author: agrant

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think it was going to be such a pain to put together but once it was finished my son loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It was a pain in the butt to put together though. Some of the pieces could have easily been assembled onto the toy already. Also it is very loud like when you take your trash cans out to the street loud. But I’ve always have wanted one for my kiddos and they love it and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This is the best selling car in America for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is the best selling car in America for a reason. We are great grandparents now and grandchildren and now great grandchildren are running this thing to death. The construction of the vehicle is amazing. You can see that a lot of engineering has gone into the design. There is not one thing that will harm a child. No sharp edges, no parts that come off. The snap together top is totally secure. The best thing is that they can just climb in, honk the horn and off they go, providing excellent entertainment for a couple of grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: mikestuff

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, and my daughter loved the one she has at daycare so we got one for at home. It took my husband quite a while to get it together, the pieces didn’t want to line up or fit together, and the wheels will not stay turned properly. But after all the effort to put it together there was no way we were trying to take it apart and send it back. Worth the purchase if you have the patience to wrestle with it, but you light be better off looking at local yard sales for a used one that’s already put together.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I know he will love it but the assembly was a joke
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson’s first birthday. I know he will love it but the assembly was a joke. I have put together multiple pieces of furniture together and even built a dollhouse and all that was a lot simpler than putting this plastic toy together. The holes where the screws were supposed to go in we’re not drilled well it was hard to get the screws in. The roof was very difficult to snap on top of the supports. Again the holes were not made well. Hopefully it will stay together well enough for my grandson to have fun
customer_reviews.author: Karla Luckmanwhey

customer_reviews.title: He has an obsession with anything that has wheels so this was the perfect christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He has an obsession with anything that has wheels so this was the perfect christmas gift. I like the fact that it has the removable floor. I just wish the roof was a bit taller so it would be easier to push him around in it, you have to bend over just slightly to push it around and it will put strain on your lower back. This is a major issue for those of us with bad disks in the lower back. Would be nice if they made a handle attachment that was a bit higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I put a lot of items together. I found this to be far more difficult and time consuming than I anticipated. At one point I had to use my power drill to insert screws because the premise wholes did not line up. Also, if you miss a step disassembling is almost impossible. Once assembled the product was great and worked as expected. May be easier to buy preassembled
customer_reviews.author: am_92387

customer_reviews.title: Change your packing tape... car is cool!
customer_reviews.text: Car is cool, will be fun for the kid now that I have gotten the tape residue off it. Luckily the thing is made of good plastic, fingernail polish remover or goo be gone didn't damage it. The side panels and roof have an interesting texture that when taped is impossible to remove the residue. 1000 grit sandpaper fixed that problem for the most part, still some dark areas (I most likely caused those). This is a present for someone else's kid. So the spots will not bother me after I leave the party. Moral of the story keep the toy in the box, make the parents deal with the world at worst tape.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Will not last for Tall Toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo loves driving this all around the house. On the grass it is a little hard for her. Only major hiccup is one of the wheels sometimes sticks - but not dealbreaker and probably I could loosen it. However she is tall (95th pctile) and barely fits. My daughter is 36 inch and so she will outgrow this very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: papa_fabuloso

customer_reviews.title: Can use like a stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I can only give 4 stars because I couldn't put it together. I had to wait for hubby to come home from work because the holes in the roof post for the door and key weren't drilled out. He accidentally made the key hole too big and it fell out. But grandson adores this. Love the floorboard! His feet don't get caught underneath and I can use it like a stroller. We walk our neighbors son to the bus stop and this has been a lifesaver. My grandson doesn't cry to get out so he's in the cozy coupe nice and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: All of the necessary parts was not enclosed
customer_reviews.text: After taking out of box and almost assembled one of the yellow corners was the same as the other side. I spoke with customer service and they said I would have to return the item which meant I would have to take apart and pay for shipping. All I needed was the corner support piece. This was for my granddaughters 2nd birthday and it was very disappointing. I have always thought Little Tikes had a good name but I don’t think I will be purchasing anything else
customer_reviews.author: Penny Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is definitely not like the ones we had a kids. Way smaller then expected. Got it for my three year old for his birthday last month and he barely fits in it, won't much longer. My 21 month old barely fits in it and my boys are average size for their age. Was a bit disappointed with the size. Boys like it though so I'll let them enjoy it while they can.
customer_reviews.author: kitsey30

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, Poor Quality control - 30 years of wanting and dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. For years my daughters wanted a Cozy Coupe. Now they are all grown and have children of their own. They tease me that they were deprived by not having a Cozy Coupe, even though hey had every other Little Tikes item on the market. Oh well. Fast forward to Christmas day 2016, missing parts and two little boys ages 3 and 1. What a shame to have missing parts. So for now, that coupe is a convertible until the missing parts arrive. Hopefully the parts will come quickly. Until then, I am not happy. Get some quality control folks!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kiddos
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this car!!! They both want to take a ride on it every day, it provides a lot of fun and it's very cute. It wasn't too easy to assemble but the instructions are very clear and will guide you through the process. My husband did it in around 1h, maybe a bit less. And super easy to operate, you can do it with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO PUT TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to give this to my son but it is IMPOSSIBLE to put together. I put together all his other christmas presents including a huge play kitchen, and this stupid car is impossible. I'm really disappointed because he was so excited to ride it it. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Caps for wheels are crap...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed that when putting this together the front was warped and the caps you use to keep the wheels on are complete crap. I wish we would have gotten decent pieces and the front wasn't warped as my son absolutely loves this car at daycare so wanted to get him one for home.
customer_reviews.author: superstarsandi

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We purchased many Little Tykes products when our children were little and always found the products to be of great quality. We just purchased the Cozy Coupe for our granddaughter and it has been a nightmare to assemble. The pieces don't line up properly, the instructions weren't great to follow, and my husband had to trim a piece so that the steering wheel clip engaged with the O ring. The quality of this Cozy Coupe is no where near the quality of the past. Our granddaughter will probably LOVE IT which is the only reason for the 3-star rating. Make sure you plan for lots of time and aggravation when assembling it. We will consider other brands next time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Super enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this so much. It’s part of our morning routine to take a little ride down the street. It’s east to maneuver and the lock switch is very sturdy especially since she can open the door now. My daughter started using this at 10 months and she is now 13 months
customer_reviews.author: crystal padilla

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled when my daughter asked for this for my grandson for Christmas. We'd gotten one before for other grandkids. I'm a handy guy--and found it was difficult to put together. This time I read and followed the directions--what a difference! Went right together. 15 month old grandson loves this, it's been one of his favorite toys for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Just think twice it may not be all right
customer_reviews.text: I am reasonably "handy," but this is a poorly constructed item and a bear to put together. The screw holes do not exist, they are shallow indentations. There is no clear angle at which to place the screws. The four longer screws they sent me did not work...three of them disintegrated as I placed them. (if you buy this good to have 4 1.5 inch screws ready. ) The plastic pieces do not fit together well. Instructions are vague. It was a long and frustrating process...and I did have to "ad lib" a bit to get it done. By the way, this is my first "bad" review on Amazon. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my small children many years ago. The wore the tires off of them. I started buying them for my grandchildren. Any child who comes over does not want to get out of them. It is a great product. It was challenging to put it together. I am glad there was two of us a assembling it. The children are creative with this. pulling it behind bikes, climbing on it, pulling other toys behind it. It is just so much fun for children. So worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephews first Christmas (8 months at the time). Easy to put together. He loves it! He zips all over the house in it. Easy for him to get in and out. Good leg space. There’s a piece on the floor to cover the leg hole so you can put baby in and push him around until he learns to walk. All little kids should have this car!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter loves it. Has slide lock on door to keep her from falling out, steering wheel moves, key turns and clicks, horn beeps but is a lit th le hard yet for her to press, she is one. Assembly was harder than I expected, but my husband had no problem with it. Follow directions exactly!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Pain to assemble, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to assemble, but totally worth it. My 15 month old loves it and was so excited when she saw the box! There weren’t any predrilled holes on the front of the car as shown in the instructions for the eyes, but wasn’t a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for the smaller ones!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't bought this. I'm giving it a four stars because it probably fits the average height child in the age range. My little tikes are little Lebrons in the making. SO, they got to use it for a day, before they grew out of it. (Exaggeration; a few months). But they worked well, not easy to assemble...and I'm positive it was never really safely assembled. But hey...whatever. Lol (but seriously.)
customer_reviews.author: RomanceAddict

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy vehicle is great. My son had the original version, which was great. We bought this for my grandson's first birthday. And, we love the slight changes such as the removable floor board and the door lock. Oh, and the handle so you can easily push the toddler who is too small to use his feet. It's sturdy and very easy to put together. We didn't attach the googly eyes though. Better without the face!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son who is almost 3 LOVEEEEES this! I found out that his daycare had it and that he was hogging it there so I purchased him one for the house. He just goes all around the house with it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: cherise

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy that I get my son the same I have as kid
customer_reviews.text: I remember when I get the old model in the 90’s I have a lot of fun playing with my friends. Now I get it for my son as a surprise and he is 1 yo and he love it. This toy is very nostalgic for me, it makes me to remember all the family members that are not with us today.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Despiau

customer_reviews.title: 17 month yr old LOVES IT !
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love these & in a few months I believe we will take out the floor & they will still play with it ! It has a fantastic weight limit 50lbs which they won’t reach until 5 yrs old so planning on getting my moneys worth
customer_reviews.author: MaryE

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the wheels
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 for maneuverability because you have to be careful of the wheels. They don't work well outside. They are great indoors. We took it out once on the sidewalk and the wheels tore up. Other than that it is an amazing car.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was just ok. And it was missing one if the taillights. Seemed like parts for each step should have been bundled together. But my kid loves it. Sturdy enough to be rolled over and over and over.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little car, buy one now for your toddler
customer_reviews.text: The best little car ever! My children had one of these, youngest is 27, so I bought this one for my grandson. He loves it! He's been playing in it since he was about 18 mos and is now 2. He likes dragging it around, riding it down hills and in general just pretending he's driving. We go on walks and he rides his car. Tough little car that survives even his 7 and 8 year old brothers. All little boys and girls need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaNC

customer_reviews.title: not good for you, not good for baby, poor design, poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: poor qulity control, you need a knive to clear the sharp edges. too much unnecessery parts. they can all be made to one piece to save assimbly time. I spend 2 hour for get it togther. it basicly a stoller, but you can not see your baby and there is no safe belt for your baby, and you do not have a control for the dirction it go. for bigger baby who try to drive it, the baby do not have a control for dirction neither. the control wheel does not connect to front wheel, it is just a horn. so who decide which direction you go? the answer is this car itself.
customer_reviews.author: Yan M.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Coupe
customer_reviews.text: Welcome down memory lane with the good ole cozy coupe. This is a great gift, that provides lots of fun. I like the feature of the floor mat that stays in place, so younger children do not have to worry about getting feet caught when you push them around.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, watch assembly video, suggest electric screw driver and at least two people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic. Child loves it. Would recommend watching the video on assembly and having at least two people present and an electric screw driver. Didn't have too many issues with assembly like other reviewers mentioned. The video is essential to watch during assembly - played at 0.25x speed and then paused and did the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hours of sweat and back pain.. I finally got it together. I'm so happy that after all my hardwork my daughter still goes to my neighbors house to get in theirs. Great little car though, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barsness

customer_reviews.title: A classic toy car
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she has a good time in it. Put together Xmas Eve with my husband, only took about an hour. Car is cute, love the option for leaving the bottom in to push her around without her feet dragging around. She’s only 18mos and not quite able to push herself with her feet. Left the eyes off bc I wanted the classic look. Just small enough to fit in a corner of her room and weave through hallways without being too bulky. Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Durable little car!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toy my grandson loves it. It’s been tipped, ran into doors spun around and ridden on top of by my son in law. And he’s is a grown man and it hasn’t broken. It’s sure stood up to the abuse. My grandson loves it. Hasn’t learnt how to move himself with the removable floor but he will eventually. A great to for my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Howard

customer_reviews.title: a huge hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 20 month old granddaughter, for Christmas. It has made us her #1 grandparents, that's for sure! She enjoys this little 'Fred Flinstone' car! It has a floorboard that can be inserted for the younger children, that depend on you pushing them in the car, or you can remove the floorboard in case the child wants to push themselves in the car! Our granddaughter loves her little red coupe!
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

customer_reviews.title: Read Directions Carefully
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this and ended up so disappointed. The tires were tough to put on and they don't really roll. I advise reading the directions VERY carefully. Assembly is extremely frustrating. I feel it's cheaply made in comparison to what I had for my daughter 10 years ago. So far my 19 month old is only interested in pushing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Son is very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the truck version was the same price because I would have loved to buy him that version. But he doesn't seem to care. I love that it has a little floor because he got this for his 1 year old birthday and obviously can't control it yet. It's the same one I had as a kid... So it is pretty cool to give him something I literally used to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory N Kay

customer_reviews.title: As great as always
customer_reviews.text: Okay Holiday gift review is in: My grandson LOVES his Cozy Coupe. He rides it inside and outside. It's perfect, he's 18 months old. The handle in the roof for the parent to push (floorboard inserted for now) is a super idea, big improvement over when my son was this age and had his own Cozy Coupe. Cupholders too. For me? A bit of a bear to assemble, it took two hours, and a lot more complicated than I expected. Had to get a helper for the pounding (too much arthritis in my hands.)
customer_reviews.author: Abby McIlroy

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy this little car
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves opening the car door, hocking the horn and turning the steering wheel. Parents love it because there is a place on it to push the kids when they are in it.
customer_reviews.author: TC in CT

customer_reviews.title: Best Buggy on the “road”!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grand baby. She loves it!!! Easy assembly! Easy for her to get in and out!. Loves to open and close door. It’s small enough to keep in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Mape

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Only came with 3 wheels. I ordered in October for Christmas and found out while assembling on Christmas Eve. I ended up ordering another wheels from the manufacturer. January 1st and still no wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Unusable due to missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This arrived missing several parts, with no manual, in a box that was ripped open. It was also, weirdly, partially assembled upon arrival (like the headlights and taillights were on and some of the decals)... given that I believe this is a refurbished product. I would have been fine with it if everything was included, Unfortunately, as parts are missing it is unusable. Wish I had been able to figure that out before I spent an hour listening to the godawful video installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: In a small box!!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a small box, the first indication of how many parts there are. It takes a while to put together and you need a drill. With that being said, take a good hour of your day for this toy. Worth the look on our granddaughters face and joy watching her play in it. It is still made well and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie K

customer_reviews.title: Regret Buy
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely difficult to assemble if you are alone without any help, and there are multiple places on the surface that have defects and cut my fingers, it's unsafe to have my kid play with it. Sadly, I couldn't disassemble it and couldn't return it. Waster money and time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My sons first birthday he got a cozy coupe car! He loves it soo much! He will get in and shut the door and honk until we push him lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mahaylee&Corin

customer_reviews.title: first birthday present
customer_reviews.text: This item was intended as a first birthday present. My daughter loves it and has played in it for 3 days straight. I especially like the addition of the floor to the car, allowing me to push her in it until she is old enough to maneuver it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Meghaan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little car is perfect! Very easy to assemble, it has an opening that’s in the right place for someone to push the car without having to bend too much. My grandson loves it so I would definitely recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Apri Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute little coupe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little guy who is turning one!! Now, we did "upgrade" the paint and turned it into the bat mobile. Overall though, it is just like the one I had when I was little! We did follow the youtube video and used a power drill to put the coupe together after we painted it. We did not have any issues following the video but I can easily see how so many others got confused. The printed directions are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - returned
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I discovered that a package containing the hardware, smaller plastic pieces, instructions and decals was missing. I immediately returned it and ended up buying the same product locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: When my granddaughter comes home from daycare the only thing she wants to do is drive around in her car. She loves this item. A great item for an 18-month-old. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old and 1 year old LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy we upgraded our old Cozy Coupe for this one! I love the extra features in this! The removable foot thing is great, the gas gap actually stays in place, it's great! It is a bit difficult to push with the handle though, I have to walk off to the side. Lots of parts, be prepared to spend some time putting this together!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Cute little buggy
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together and its quite adorable...i read some of the reviews about needing a miracle of God to put it together. Granted there are quite a few pieces ok there are a lot lol but an hour later it was togetger and not that seriously traumatizing as some put it. My 2 yr old will ve excited when he wakes up christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: OkestMom

customer_reviews.title: Buy PRE-Assembled!
customer_reviews.text: .The instructions were terrible. There was NO parent handle. Some of the parts did not fit properly. It was a frustrating experience! Once it's completed, it's cute but you will probably feel like running it over after all the trouble that you just experienced.
customer_reviews.author: P. Padden

customer_reviews.title: a kid favorite
customer_reviews.text: not only are they cute, but they are also a kid favorite and last for generations. The one I have has been passed down to me and is in great condition. Is also great for different age ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M. De León-Piña

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for our 1yr grandson. Had bought one for his dad 30 yrs ago and was pleasantly surprised at the improvements since then. Handle to use it as a stroller and removable floor. I wish they had added a seat belt to keep the younger ones seated. But it hasn’t been a big issue and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome car!! Nightmare set up :( ...I LOVE putting things together, but this thing was a little more intense than I had anticipated. It still all worked out, but be SUPER careful to follow instructions, and if you make a mistake, realize that some of the screws and caps and plastic pieces cannot be repositioned. :(
customer_reviews.author: RSGillen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Christmas to My Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was my one year old Grandsons Christmas present! He loves it! This toy has been around for many years- Little Tikes definitely knows how to make toys!
customer_reviews.author: pritchard hensley

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, excellent quality. It took a bit of time to put together, especially the wheels. But the end result was worth it. Our 1 year old grandson loves to ride in it, and the hand grip area on the top makes this easy, although adults have to bend over to push it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Card

customer_reviews.title: Baby you can drive my car
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. Well Santa did lol He loves it. Drives around everywhere. Has road rage a bit. We are working on it. It’s sturdy, he’s had a few crashes. All have survived, no law suits. All around it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SassyLassie

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: Got the car in and package seemed fine. Got the parts out of the box and I looks like they were already used! There were scratches and dirt on the red parts (main car part).
customer_reviews.author: Nichole K

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TOY E V E R.
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST-HAVE for every child. I give this to everyone I know as my staple gift and it is ALWAYS A HIT; plus it is a hand-me down! Well made, durable, indoors or outdoors. It's easy to clean. It's their personal space. Please buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Masi

customer_reviews.title: A million little pieces
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old LOVES this, which made the infuriating process of assembling all 789384652 parts worth it. Just be prepared to literally assemble every last piece; even the pieces you’d never guess come in pieces!!
customer_reviews.author: McP House

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this thing. It was the only present he cared about. It was easy to put together and is durable. Definitely recommended this little car to any little car enthusiast like my son.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Broam

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect, classic toy
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with the Cozy Coupe? It's a perfect, classic toy. It was kind of PITA to put together, so definitely carve out some time for that if you're wanting to present it to your kids in a finished state. I didn't realize we'd need the entire toolbox when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are uneven, must be because they’re made in bulk
customer_reviews.text: Put the car together, everything looked even. When my baby sat inside and we tried to push her around, the right wheel kept getting stuck on turns and drag on the ground without spinning because it’s shorter than the rest of the wheels. Very disappointed since our little one loves riding around in it. Ordering a replacement box to swap out parts, hoping it’s just one wheel and the whole car body isn’t the issue.
customer_reviews.author: David Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Good car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler earlier this year and he loves it. It was pretty easy to put together, but there were lots of little tiny plastic flakes from manufacturing that got EVERYWHERE. Make sure you have your vacuum out while you put it together. The wheels.. I wish you could get wheels custom made with rubber or something so it would be a little more useful outside but I haven't been able to find anything. We had to WD-40 the front wheels because they would get stuck when rotating around when changing direction or turning the car. He likes it though, just wish we could find custom wheels for it.
customer_reviews.author: blawar

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a toddler. At 1 1/2 the child can happily ride in it but probably needs to be pushed. There is a handy grip in the back of the roof for just that. After two they usually can begin to push themselves with their feet. By four the child is likely, but not necessarily, to big for it or will have moved on to other things. In the meantime it has served for two years at least and provides great fun.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtfan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!!!!!! We still have the original one for my son that is now 14 years old and he was 2 when we got this. Kids still play with this. I had to purchase one for my 20 month old Niece. My 8 year old daughter will still push friends around in her pink one. My boy that is 11 will tie a strap to the cozy coupe and attach it to the bike and his friends take turns being pulled. They have a blast with this still. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Bronson is 1 1/2 and loves driving his Cozy Coupe! Make sure you get the 30th Anniversary car, not the earlier model. This one has more features that make it much better!
customer_reviews.author: KarenSue

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy for many years.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids think it's great. I've bought several of these over the years and are still a quality toy. Some reviews say they are hard to assemble. Just follow the directions and everything goes together like it says.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Video instructions not 100% accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain to but together. The video is not accurate, different model than what was purchased. In addition, the bar for the back tires was too short, we had to improvise and leave out the plastic dividers. I was looking forward to this car for my nephew, now I am just hoping it stays together.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Cozy Coupe 30th Anniversary Car, Non-Assembled, Standard Packaging
product_meta.description:
Durable Product

BRAND STORY
By Little Tikes

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The classic COZY COUPE comes to life in this friendly-faced 30th Anniversay Edition. Now this classic kid powered car has a whole new look. New features include removable floor and handle on back for parent controlled push rides.

See more
feature_bullets: For generations - 30 years - children have been taking adventure and imagination on the road with one of the original ride on toys-the COZY COUPE
New features include removable floor and handle on back for parent controlled push rides
Designed with a high seat back and storage in the rear
Includes special features like an "ignition switch" and an open-and-close gas cap
Cozy rolls on rugged, durable tires, front wheels spin 360 degrees; Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,811 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
